mapper.select: select * from (select b.*, m.name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by bSeq desc) as 'bNo' from tblBoard b inner join tblMember m on b.mseq = m.mseq) r where bNo between ${begin} and ${end}

select * from (select b.*, m.name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by bSeq desc) as 'bNo' from tblBoard b inner join tblMember m on b.mseq = m.mseq where ${search} like '%${word}%') r where bNo between ${begin} and ${end}

select * from (select b.*, m.name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by bSeq desc) as 'bNo' from tblBoard b inner join tblMember m on b.mseq = m.mseq where bTitle like '%${word}%' || bContent like '%${word}%' || name like '%${word}%') r where bNo between ${begin} and ${end}
select count(*) from tblBoard b inner join tblMember m on b.mseq = m.mseq where ${search} like '%${word}%'
